import React from 'react' import ChatOnline from '../../components/chatOnline/ChatOnline' import Conversations from '../../components/conversations/Conversations' import Message from '../../components/message/Message' import Navbar from '../../components/navbar/Navbar' import { AuthContext } from '../../context/AuthContext' import { useContext, useState, useEffect } from 'react' import './messenger.css' import axios from 'axios' export default function Messenger() { const [conversations, setConversations] = useState([]) const { user } = useContext(AuthContext) useEffect(() => { const getConversations = async () => { try { const res = await axios.get('/conversations/' + user._id) setConversations(res.data) console.log(res.data) } catch (err) { console.log(err) } } getConversations() }, [user._id]) return ( <>
{conversations.map((c) => ( ))}
